title: New Providers
body: The new provider indicator in Network360 allows users to identify new to the market providers.

entries.question: Where can I use the new provider indicator in Network360?
entries.answer:
The option to use new provider records is available in:

- Home
- Create a List

entries.question: How are new providers identified?
entries.answer: Zelis uses the NPI file to identify new providers each month. We then match those NPIs to the provider data and identify New Providers.
